TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 1 220 Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 24000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRAGON KVN HOME drifted in start, held gamely. MY CC DYNASTY vied, denied. KWIK TRIP shifted out, not enough.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 2 250 Y Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Purse 22000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VOLCASH broke in, vied, prevailed. MC BLANES FROST clean trip, vied, denied. SUPER GREMLIN shifted in start, lugging in, held show. THEMAGICDRAGONLADY broke out, no factor. INPERFECT outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Super Gremlin
ENTRY.COMMENT: shifted in start, lugging in, held show

TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE

ENTRY.NAME: Inperfect
ENTRY.OWNER: Dallas Framing and M C Construction

TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 3 250 Y Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 24000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMATEUR NIGHT vied, prevailed. TF MR JESS CANDY vied, bested, held place. SEPARATE INCIDENT prompted between horses, not enough. IMA JETTIN PATRIOT outrun. A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REVIEWING THE START RESULTED IN NO CHANGE TO THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 4 250 Y Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 30000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER SINCE JANUARY 1. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHEMA vied outside, ridden out. GO RHONDA GO step slow start, vied, bested, up place. ENCORES BRIGHT IMAGE vied between horses, yielded late. RARIN tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Go Rhonda Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, vied, bested, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Encores Bright Image
ENTRY.OWNER: Beam, Roger D. and Beam, Kimberly A.

TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 5 330 Y Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Purse 22000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENCORES FIRST ACT cleared, held. SHEZAINABAR lugging in, second best. JL QUEEN BLUE no menace.

TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE
